Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
Name: STDDEV()
Description:
Returns the population standard deviation of
            expr.
            STDDEV() is a synonym for the
            standard SQL function
            STDDEV_POP(), provided for
            compatibility with Oracle.

If there are no matching rows, or if
            expr is NULL,
            STDDEV() returns
            NULL.

This function executes as a window function if
            over_clause is present.
            over_clause is as described in
            Section 14.20.2, “Window Function Concepts and Syntax”.
